features: Designed ergonomically with padded & moisture wicking backpack straps, back panel & hip belt for long term comfort and support
Hip belt, shoulder strap adjustors and top load adjusters allow for the bag to be held close to your center of gravity, stabilizing the pack for longer treks
Sternum straps offers further load stability & provide a safety whistle
Luggage meets travel pack - a large butterfly opening reveals two separate packing compartments for maximum organization
Padded 17” laptop sleeve in main compartment can be accessed from inside the bag or from a top access point
Two zippered front panel pockets with mesh slip pockets, a padded electronic pocket, a key fob and a pen slot
Self-repairing lockable zippers with easy grip zipper pulls can be used to secure even heavily stuffed luggage without risk of breaking
Lockable top zippers can be double secured by linking into the Central Lock Point
Bottom shoe compartment keeps dirty shoes away from clean clothes
Mesh stuffer pocket in front is secured with bouldering hook to keep your wet items drying as you go
Side pockets provide access to quick-grab essentials such as water bottles or camera tripods
Compression straps present on the exterior for jacket or additional gear attachment
Durable Bi-Tech fabric bottom is weather and abrasion resistant, and easily wipes down
Top, bottom and side haul handles allow you to pick up the bag from almost any angle with ease
A tuck-away rainfly lives in the bottom pocket to protect your entire bag from a rain storm when needed
Skip the luggage lines and use this bag as a carry-on
The Global Companion 40L is completely covered by the Eagle Creek No Matter What Warranty
